TEXT.TITLE: MCA <MCA> SEEKS TO LIMIT DIRECTORS' LIABILITY
TEXT.BODY: MCA Inc said shareholders at the annual meeting on May Five will be asked to approve a change to its certificate of incorporation eliminating certain liabilities of directors to MCA or its shareholders under Delaware law. Reuter
